name: I'm So Glad We Had This Time Together by Maurice Vellekoop – By the Lake Book Club
description:
I'm So Glad We Had This Time Together, by 2024 Toronto Book Award winner Maurice Vellekoop, is a graphic memoir tracing his journey from a queer boy in a strict Christian home to a renowned artist. Set in 1970s Toronto, it delves into family, faith, sexuality, and art's transformative power, blending humor and poignancy. This event will be moderated by Chris Middleton.

By the Lake Book Club hosts six Tuesday-night events from February to December with top Canadian authors and Humber Polytechnics alumni. Each in-person event features readings, discussions, Q&A, book signings, and ASL interpretation, while virtual sessions include live subtitles and audio access.

organizer.name: City of Toronto, Humber Polytechnic, Faculty of Media, Creative Arts, and Design

name: Christmas with the Clemons
description:
Join the Clemons family for a magical evening of music, joy, and holiday spirit. The show features an incredible lineup of live performances by Jully Black, Karl Wolf, Sean Jones, Dani Doucette, Armando, and Soprano Scarlato, with Sean Jones as host.

Celebrate the beste time of year with unforgettable performances and heartwarming moments, all in support of marginalized and racialized youth in our community through the gift of education.

name: Spotlight at The Second City: December
description:
Our final monthly showcase of 2025! 

Featuring two dynamic duos Andy Assaf and Vivek Srikanthan, and Glen and Vinny.

Winners of the Dumbest of the Fest Award at Denver Sketchfest 2025, Andy Assaf and Vivek Srikanthan are two solo comedians who met performing on the sketch festival circuit across North America. This time, they team up to bring their signature characters and the dumbest ideas they are too scared to try by themselves. Come see what Andy's auntie called "a real Laurel and Hardy vibe".

Clown duo Glen and Vinny got their start as grips on The Johnny Carson show, and after sleeping their way to the middle, booked a Disney Cruise and are thrilled to be making their Second City debut.

name: By Request: Christmas Concert
description: We are looking forward to sharing with you a festive evening of music, featuring the world premieres of two young Toronto composers, highlights from Wicked and Jurassic Park, the 4th movement of Dvořák's New World Symphony, Márquez's Danzón No. 2, seasonal favourites and more!
